answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
There are a few websites where you can go to search for RFPs in particular states.  www.findrfp.com allows you to search by state and includes federal as well as state and local RFPs.

author: Kathleen Stanko
text:
Elan is a land planning and site design firm that has several brownfield redevelopment projects in the works.
We are based in New York State and have been tracking various initiatives but I feel we have missed some opportunities.
Can anyone give me links regarding RFPs in the northeast region of the US, conferences, awards, etc.?
Thank you!
title: Brownfield Sources
